headline: Federal Realty Investment Trust (FRT) Valuation Check After Recent Short Term Share Price Recovery
summary: Why Federal Realty Investment Trust is on investors' radar Federal Realty Investment Trust (FRT) has drawn investor attention after recent trading, with the stock closing at $105.76 while carrying a value score of 5 and an indicated intrinsic discount of 28.1%. With revenue of US$1.26b and net income of US$337.58m, plus a long record of quarterly dividend increases, the REIT’s recent month and past 3 months returns may invite closer scrutiny from income focused investors. See our latest...
